mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_permission_menu pm ON m.id = pm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON pm.permission_id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = true AND m.visible = true ORDER BY m.sort_order ASC, m.id ASC
